content: Yesterday I was using the text editor on JHub and the document I was working on kept jumping around, shooting up to the top as if someone hit the scroll bar (but I didn't). The platform was unusable for me due to this issue. Has anyone else experienced this?
I frequently experience this and would like to know why this happens. Sometimes reloading the browser fixes it without interrupting the JHub session.

Something similar was happening to me... not sure if it's the same thing, but if you have a find open (i.e. cmd-f), a bunch of commands operate relative to the cell your find is hovering on. So exiting the find makes this problem go away for me.
